HERO.TITLE_PREFIX: Master finance, real estate, and investing with
HERO.SUBTITLE: Our AI mentor is available 24/7 to help you become financially fit — learn finance, real estate, and investment strategies through interactive quizzes and real-time guidance.

FEATURES.TITLE: Why Choose Fined Mentor?
FEATURES.SUBTITLE: Everything you need to accelerate your professional growth in one place.
FEATURES.MENTORSHIP_DESC: Get guidance from an AI-powered mentor specialized in finance, real estate, and investing to help you build wealth and avoid common mistakes.
FEATURES.QUIZZES_DESC: Test your knowledge with our curated quizzes designed to reinforce your learning and track progress.
FEATURES.COMMUNITY_DESC: Join a vibrant community of learners and professionals. Share ideas, get feedback, and grow together.

HOW_IT_WORKS.TITLE: How It Works
HOW_IT_WORKS.SUBTITLE: Three simple steps to start your journey.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP1_DESC: Sign up in seconds and build your professional profile.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP2_DESC: Connect instantly with our AI mentor specialized in finance and real estate.
HOW_IT_WORKS.STEP3_DESC: Schedule sessions, take quizzes, and track your progress.

PRICING.TITLE: Simple Pricing
PRICING.SUBTITLE: Choose the plan that fits your needs.

TESTIMONIALS.TITLE: Success Stories
TESTIMONIALS.SUBTITLE: Hear from our community of learners and mentors.

STORY1.NAME: Sarah Jenkins
STORY1.TEXT: "Fined Mentor provided the clarity I needed for my first multi-family deal. The AI mentor's property analysis advice was spot on!"

STORY2.NAME: Michael Chen
STORY2.TEXT: "The quizzes on stock market fundamentals were exactly what I needed. I feel much more confident managing my own portfolio now."

STORY3.NAME: Jessica Williams
STORY3.TEXT: "Finding a tool that actually understands complex diversification strategies is rare. Fined Mentor is now a daily part of my routine."

FOOTER.DESC: Mastering wealth through expert AI mentorship in finance, real estate, and investments.

IMPRESSUM.TITLE: Impressum
IMPRESSUM.SUBTITLE: (Legal Notice)
IMPRESSUM.PRIVACY_NOTE: For privacy inquiries, please email us directly or visit our Privacy Policy page.
IMPRESSUM.DISPUTE_DESC: The European Commission provides a platform for online dispute resolution (OS):
IMPRESSUM.DISPUTE_NOTE: We are not willing or obliged to participate in dispute resolution proceedings before a consumer arbitration board.
IMPRESSUM.LIABILITY_CONTENT_DESC1: As a service provider, we are responsible for our own content on these pages in accordance with § 7 (1) TMG (German Telemedia Act). According to §§ 8 to 10 TMG, however, we are not obligated to monitor transmitted or stored third-party information or to investigate circumstances that indicate illegal activity.
IMPRESSUM.LIABILITY_CONTENT_DESC2: Obligations to remove or block the use of information under general law remain unaffected. However, liability in this regard is only possible from the point in time at which a concrete infringement of the law becomes known. If we become aware of any such infringements, we will remove this content immediately.
IMPRESSUM.LIABILITY_LINKS_DESC1: Our website contains links to external third-party websites over whose content we have no influence. Therefore, we cannot assume any liability for this external content. The respective provider or operator of the pages is always responsible for the content of the linked pages.
IMPRESSUM.LIABILITY_LINKS_DESC2: The linked pages were checked for possible legal violations at the time of linking. Illegal content was not recognizable at the time of linking. However, permanent monitoring of the content of the linked pages is not reasonable without concrete evidence of an infringement. If we become aware of any legal violations, we will remove such links immediately.
IMPRESSUM.COPYRIGHT_DESC1: The content and works created by the site operators on these pages are subject to German copyright law. Duplication, processing, distribution and any kind of exploitation outside the limits of copyright law require the written consent of the respective author or creator. Downloads and copies of this site are only permitted for private, non-commercial use.
IMPRESSUM.COPYRIGHT_DESC2: Insofar as the content on this site was not created by the operator, the copyrights of third parties are observed. In particular, third-party content is identified as such. Should you nevertheless become aware of a copyright infringement, please inform us accordingly. If we become aware of any infringements, we will remove such content immediately.

PRIVACY.TITLE: Privacy Policy
PRIVACY.SUBTITLE: (Datenschutzerklärung)
PRIVACY.INTRO: FinEd Mentor ("we", "our", or "us") is committed to protecting your privacy. This Privacy Policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your personal information in accordance with the General Data Protection Regulation (GDPR) and other applicable data protection laws.
PRIVACY.CONTROLLER_DESC: The data controller responsible for your personal data is:
PRIVACY.CONTROLLER_NOTE: For privacy inquiries or to exercise your data rights, please contact us at the email address above. You can also find our full contact information on our Impressum page.
PRIVACY.EMAIL_DESC: Email address - For account identification and communication
PRIVACY.QUIZ_RESULTS_DESC: Quiz Results - Performance tracking and generated questions
PRIVACY.CONTRACT_PERFORMANCE_DESC: We process your email and username to manage your account and provide you with personalized AI mentorship, chat sessions, and quiz generation services.
PRIVACY.LEGITIMATE_INTERESTS_DESC: Processing IP addresses for security, rate limiting, and fraud prevention. Analyzing usage data to improve our AI models and the mentorship experience.
PRIVACY.GOOGLE_DESC: We use Google's Gemini models to generate educational content and provide mentorship.
PRIVACY.RENDER_DESC: Render is used to host the backend server, frontend and redis.
PRIVACY.TAVILY_DESC: Used to supplement AI knowledge with real-time information for your learning sessions.
PRIVACY.CLOUD_HOSTING_DESC: Your data is stored in secure cloud databases managed according to industry standards.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_ACCESS_DESC: Request a copy of your personal learning data.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_ERASURE_DESC: Request permanent deletion of your account and chat logs.
PRIVACY.RIGHT_OBJECT_DESC: Object to data processing based on legitimate interests.
PRIVACY.RIGHTS_EXERCISE: How to exercise your rights: Email us at maxwelltb4@gmail.com.
PRIVACY.SECURITY_DESC: We implement appropriate technical and organizational security measures to protect your data, including encryption in transit (HTTPS/TLS), secure authentication via JWT, and access controls for our microservices. However, no method of transmission over the Internet is 100% secure.
PRIVACY.QUESTIONS_DESC: If you have questions about this Privacy Policy or want to exercise your data rights, please contact us.

TERMS.TITLE: Terms of Service
TERMS.SUBTITLE: (Nutzungsbedingungen)
TERMS.CONTACT_NOTE: For complete contact information and legal details, please see our Impressum page.
TERMS.ACCEPTANCE_DESC: By accessing and using FinedMentor ("the Service"), you agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, please do not use the Service. These terms constitute a legally binding agreement between you and FinedMentor.
TERMS.SERVICE_DESC: FinedMentor is an AI-powered mentorship platform that provides:
TERMS.SERVICE_AI_DESC: Personalized chat sessions with advanced AI models.
TERMS.SERVICE_QUIZ_DESC: Generated assessments to help track your learning progress.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_DESC: To use certain features, you must create an account. You are responsible for:
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_SECURITY: Maintaining the security of your account credentials.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_ACTIVITIES: All activities that occur under your account.
TERMS.ACCOUNTS_COMPLIANCE: Ensuring your content complies with these terms.
TERMS.CONTENT_DESC: You retain ownership of all content you upload to the Service. By uploading content, you grant FinedMentor a license to store and transmit your content solely for the purpose of providing the service.
TERMS.CONTENT_PROHIBITED_DESC: You agree not to upload content that violates laws, infringes on intellectual property, contains malware, or is harmful/defamatory.
TERMS.LIMITATIONS_DESC: The Service is provided "as is" without warranties of any kind. We do not guarantee uninterrupted or error-free service, specific uptime, or performance levels. This does not affect your statutory rights as a consumer.
TERMS.LIABILITY_DESC: To the maximum extent permitted by law, FinedMentor shall not be liable for any indirect, incidental, or consequential damages. This does not apply to cases of intent, gross negligence, or injury to life/health.
TERMS.GOVERNING_LAW_DESC: These Terms are governed by the laws of Germany. For consumers in the EU/EEA, this choice of law does not deprive you of protection from mandatory laws in your country of residence.
TERMS.QUESTIONS_DESC: If you have questions about these terms, please contact our support team.
